tv.noixion.troncli.examples

Class IERC20Proxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • tv.noixion.troncli.SmartContractEventListener
      • tv.noixion.troncli.TronContractProxy
        • tv.noixion.troncli.examples.IERC20Proxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TronEventHandler

    public class IERC20Proxy
extends TronContractProxy
    Proxy for the basic standard token ERC20.
